SEARCH
Module CODEX
Package CODEX.org.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
CODEX.utils.Observable
CODEX.org.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Observable implements Serializable
This class represents the instance of a single game started by the Server
See Also:

    Chat
    startChat(String p1Nickname, String p2Nickname)
    This method adds a new chat to the List chat in this game.
    void
    startGame()
    This method sets the state of the game to STARTED, it shuffles the resource deck and the gold one, giving for each type of deck 2 cards to the market, then it shuffles the base deck and each player draws a starter card (base card) the method lets the players decide the color of their pawn, the order of choosing is the order in which the player connected to the server it gives 2 cards to the market as common objective it gives each player 2 objective cards, he will decide which one to choose it sets the game-order of the players
    Chat
    startGeneralChat()
    This method adds a new chat to the List chat in this game.
    Map<Integer,List<String>>
    winner()
    This method returns a List with the player who won the match.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(List<Player> gamePlayers, int id)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      gamePlayers - is the List of players that will play the game
      id - each game has a different id

    • Game

      public Game(Player player, int id)
      Class constructor
      Parameters:
      player - creator
      id - game ID

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(Player p) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
      Only the first player is added to the list by the constructor, the others will be added thanks to this function
      Parameters:
      p - a player that has to be added
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - if max number of player is reached

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method sets the state of the game to STARTED, it shuffles the resource deck and the gold one, giving for each type of deck 2 cards to the market, then it shuffles the base deck and each player draws a starter card (base card) the method lets the players decide the color of their pawn, the order of choosing is the order in which the player connected to the server it gives 2 cards to the market as common objective it gives each player 2 objective cards, he will decide which one to choose it sets the game-order of the players
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if players are less than 2 or more than 4

    • chosenPawns

      public void chosenPawns()
      This method is called by the GameController when all the players have chosen their Pawn's color

    • giveInitialCards

      public void giveInitialCards()
      After the player has played on the board the baseCard, this function is invoked. It gives to each Player (2 resourceCards + 1 goldCard). It also reveals the common ObjectiveCards and gives 2 ObjectiveCards per Player to be selected later

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      This method ends the game

    • winner

      public Map<Integer,List<String>> winner()
      This method returns a List with the player who won the match. If there are 2 or more winners, it returns a List with the players with the same "Points and Objectives completed" situation.
      Returns:
      winner is the List containing the winner or the players who tied

    • startChat

      public Chat startChat(String p1Nickname, String p2Nickname)
      This method adds a new chat to the List chat in this game. P1 and P2 are the 2 players the chat is composed by
      Parameters:
      p1Nickname - first player in the chat
      p2Nickname - second player in the chat
      Returns:
      the created new chat

    • startGeneralChat

      public Chat startGeneralChat()
      This method adds a new chat to the List chat in this game. The new chat is composed by all the players in this game
      Returns:
      the new chat created

    • getChatByUsers

      public Chat getChatByUsers(List<String> usersNicknames)
      This method returns the chat given the users
      Parameters:
      usersNicknames - are the users for which I'm looking for the Chat
      Returns:
      the Chat if found, null otherwise

    • nextRound

      public void nextRound()
      The first player of the list, after this method is invoked, is the one who will need to play soon, at the next round. The order of the whole list is modified

    • resetGoldCard1

      public void resetGoldCard1()
      This method is useful to replace the gold card 1 in the market.
